th_name: ซุปฝักทอง

cn_name: 泰式香草炒鸡肉/牛肉/虾/鱿鱼
desc_en: Fragrant Thai herbs stir-fried to a spicy kick—with your choice of chicken or seafood.
desc_cn: 芳香的泰式香草爆炒顾客自选的任何肉类。

th_name: ผัดพริกเผา ฮาลาล
cn_name: 辣椒酱炒菜鸡肉/牛肉/虾/鱿鱼
desc_en: Intense and flavorful—sweet chili paste stir-fried with your choice of protein.
desc_cn: 浓郁而可口——甜辣酱与您选择的蛋白质一起翻炒。

en_name: Curry Powder Stir-Fry (Pad Pong Gha Ri)
th_name: ผัดผงกะหรี่
desc_en: Wok-tossed in Thai curry powder and herbs – with shrimp, squid or both.
desc_cn: 用泰式咖喱粉和香草炒制，搭配虾、鱿鱼或两者。

en_name: Oyster Sauce Stir-Fried Australia Beef (Neua Pad Nam Mun Hoi)
th_name: เนื้อออสเตรเลียผัดน้ำมันหอย ฮาลาล
desc_en: Tender beef glazed in a savory oyster sauce blend.
desc_cn: 嫩牛肉淋上美味的蚝油。

th_name: ผัดไข่เค็ม
desc_en: Creamy and rich—salted egg adds a decadent twist with your choice of shrimp, squid or both.
desc_cn: 奶油味浓郁的咸蛋与您选择的虾、鱿鱼或两者一起增添了浓郁的风味。

en_name: Stir-Fried Broccoli with Shrimp (Pad Broccoli Kung)
th_name: ผัดบ็อคโครี่ กุ้ง
desc_en: Classic veggie-meets-seafood favorite.
desc_cn: 经典的蔬菜与海鲜搭配美食。

en_name: Stir-Fried Mixed Veggies with Seafood (Pad Pak Luam Talay)
th_name: ผัดผักร่วมอาหารทะเล
desc_en: Balanced and colorful—wholesome Thai stir-fry with shrimp and squid.
desc_cn: 均衡且色彩鲜艳——有益健康的泰式虾和鱿鱼炒菜。

th_name: ผัดพริกแกง ฮาลาล
desc_en: Thai red curry paste stir-fried with your choice of protein.
desc_cn: 泰式红咖喱酱与您选择的蛋白质一起翻炒。

en_name: Mixed Seasonal Vegetable Stir-Fry (Pad Pak Luam)
th_name: ผัดผักรวมตามฤดูกาล
desc_en: Fresh garden seasonal vegetables, lightly seasoned.
desc_cn: 新鲜的花园时令蔬菜，调味清淡。
